tasks.jar: javac Main.java && jar cf app.jar Main.class

tasks.setup: echo Setting up Rocky Linux environment

tasks.install: yum install -y epel-release && yum install -y ansible
apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3 python3-pip

tasks.create: echo 'This is a test artifact' > artifact.tar.gz

tasks.setup: apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl git jq

tasks.install: apt-get update && apt-get install -y vim net-tools

tasks.build: javac App.java && jar cf app.jar App.class
